data.meta_description: Learn about Uma Thurman on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Uma Thurman, such as Red, White & Royal Blue, Kill Bill: Volume 1 and more.
data.text:
Now and Gwen

Francine's sister, Gwen, arrives at the house and is up to no good. Meanwhile, Stan teaches Steve the art of hugging, and Klaus shadows Roger's dramatic comments.

Previews

The cast and crew are ready to perform `Bombshell' in front of its first audience, but the first preview falls short after a major crisis involving Rebecca.

The Movie Star

The arrival of Rebecca Duvall shakes up the production of the musical, so Karen and Ivy must work together. Meanwhile, Tom and Sam grow closer, and Julia and Frank must handle a family crisis.

Understudy

Hollywood star Rebecca Duvall is set to take on the role of Marilyn, but who will fill her shoes when she misses important rehearsals?
